Unfix fix typo

In portuguese, the singular form of "items" ("itens" in portuguese) is "item" :)

title: Limit external Wikipedia link support to just few languages.
message:
Limit external Wikipedia link support to just few languages.

Including all Wikipedia languages for three projects (Wikipedia,
Wiktionary, Wikiquote) resulted in large AndroidManifest.xml with
hundreds of entries. It didn't cause any issues before Android 6.0.1,
but since 6.0.1 package manager crashes when trying to read package
info, so list of supported external links had to be reduced.

title: Increase blob list adapter loading chunk size
message:
Increase blob list adapter loading chunk size

Loading more items causes data change notification which is not fine
grained and results in all loaded pager items destroyed and created
again, which results in reloading already loaded articles and makes ui
look "jumpy". Increasing loading chunk size makes it a relatively rare
occurence.

title: Tweak stemming heuristics
message:
Tweak stemming heuristics

If first result is much longer then requested key - try again with
shorter lookup key. This in some cases brings in shorter matches
which is usually better. Ideally all prefix matches would be sorted by
length, but it's probably not feasible because of key sort order in
dictionary.

Another tweak is to limit number of characters to chop off since
resulting matches are not very good if found and if long input is
provided it takes a rather long time.

title: Set preferred style by slob uri instead of id.
message:
Set preferred style by slob uri instead of id.

Setting style preference by uri results in preserving style preference
when dictionary is replaced by newer version and maintaining same
style selection across volumes of a split dictionary.

title: Do not modify blob descriptor last access time in resolve()
message:
Do not modify blob descriptor last access time in resolve()

resolve() may be called in a background thread so last access
modification may happen while blob descriptor list is being sorted by
it on the main thread (when new history item is added), which may
cause comparator contract violation which results in sort throwing
exception and app crash.

title: Use 127.0.0.1 to acces content instead of localhost.
message:
Use 127.0.0.1 to acces content instead of localhost.

Using "localhost" causes name resolution. No need fot that. Also,
localhost may fail to resolve on some systems with modified network
settings (for example by ad blocking apps).

message: bump version

title: Do not URL-decode key, it's already decoded.
message:
Do not URL-decode key, it's already decoded.

Attempting to decode already decoded key blows up on keys like
"%D". Decoding ths key was done initially to work around Java
URLEncoder encoding spaces as + (in Slobber). Instead, Slobber should
use URL encoding method that escapes space as %20.

title: Implement ability to turn dictionaries on/off.
message:
Implement ability to turn dictionaries on/off.

When many dictionaries are open, sometimes it's difficult to find
entries from a specific dictionary in lookup results. Turning
dictionaries on/off provides a way to filter lookup
results. Dictionaries that are turned off are excluded from lookup,
but bookmarks and history associated with them are still available.
